page.title: 16Sport:Rugby
page.content:
Ballyclare{Rugby}Club is situated off the Doagh Road in Ballyclare. The{club has three main teams which play in matches all over Ireland, both north and south. They are a very famous junior team in the province and have had many successful seasons in the past few years.
Most of their members are past pupils of {Ballyclare High School. }This encourages the boys in school to keep playing the game.
The members of the Rugby Club allow {Lions }International to hold their meetings in the clubhouse. Lions International are famous for their concern for people in need.
